summary: This is a touching and somber journey of Lasya, who lives with her father Karma and younger brother Chomo in a remote village in the Himalayas. Pristine snow capped mountains surround their... See full synopsis »
cast: Danny Denzongpa|Gauri|Aungchuk|Shakeel Khan|Yashpal Sharma|Raj Zutshi|Aamir Bashir|Denzil Smith|Anuradha Baral|Sonam Stobgias Gorky|Sanjay Swaraj|Stanzin Jordan|Singhe|Shilpa Shukla|Manish Mathur|Chandus|Wangchuk Dorjey Mogul|Ritila Anar|Nawang Jigmet|Padma|Karma|Namgyal|Shivajee Chandrabhushan
title: Frozen
